metadata.title: CVE-2019-15694 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: TigerVNC version prior to 1.10.1 is vulnerable to heap buffer overflow,which could be triggered from DecodeManager::decodeRect. Vulnerabilityoccurs due to the signdness error in processing MemOutStream. Exploitationof this vulnerability could potentially result into remote code execution.This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

criterions.comment: tigervnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
